title: Clear Bra: Invisible Paint Protection -- /DRIVE CLEAN
description: Clear bra is a urethane based film that is applied onto your vehicle's paint. Its purpose is to protect the high impact areas from road debris and rock chips. Improvements in technology and installation techniques make it possible for modern technician to be almost undetectable. On the week's episode of DRIVE CLEAN we seek to clarify the function, care, and value of this transparent protective film.
tags: car care, paint protection, Clear Bra Invisible Paint Protection, how to apply clear car bra

asset.title: Clear Bra: Invisible Paint Protection -- /DRIVE CLEAN

Check out http://www.ammonyc.com and download your free "Clear Bra Installation Tips".
Clear bra is a urethane based film that is applied onto your vehicle's paint. Its purpose is to protect the high impact areas from road debris and rock chips. Improvements in technology and installation techniques make it possible for modern technician to be almost undetectable. On the week's episode of DRIVE CLEAN we seek to clarify the function, care, and value of this transparent protective film.
